0.text: Innate: Soraka gains  70% bonus movement speed while moving towards allied  champions below  40% of their maximum health.

Active: Soraka calls down a star upon the target location, granting  sight of the area before landing after 0.25 − 1 (based on target range) seconds, dealing magic damage to enemies within and  slowing them by 30% for 1.5 seconds.

1.text: Hitting at least one enemy  champion returns the star dust toward Soraka, granting her Rejuvenation for 2.5 seconds which  heals her every 0.5 seconds and grants her  bonus movement speed that decays over the duration.

2.text: While Soraka is Rejuvenated,  Astral Infusion will also grant the effects of Rejuvenation to the targeted ally for the same duration.

0.text: Active: Soraka  heals the target allied champion (excluding herself).

1.text: If cast while  Rejuvenated, the health cost will be reduced by a percentage.

2.text: Astral Infusion cannot be cast if Soraka is  below 5% of her maximum health.

0.text: Active: Soraka creates a celestial zone at the target location, dealing magic damage to enemy champions within the area at the time of cast. The zone then persists for 1.5 seconds,  silencing all enemy champions inside.

1.text: After the duration, the zone detonates, dealing the same magic damage to all enemy champions within the area and  rooting them for a duration.

0.text: Active: Soraka calls upon the stars, instantly  healing herself and all allied champions, increased by 50% on targets  below 40% of their maximum health.

1.concerningText: Active: Soraka calls down a star upon the target location, granting  sight of the area before landing after 0.25 − 1 (based on target range) seconds, dealing magic damage to enemies within and  slowing them by 30% for 1.5 seconds.

After the duration, the zone detonates, dealing the same magic damage to all enemy champions within the area and  rooting them for a duration.

stats.originHTML:
Stats

+8 ability power
+10 health
+50% base mana regeneration
+ 2 per 10 seconds

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Unique – Tribute: Grants a charge every 10 seconds, up to 3 charges. If an allied champion is nearby, damaging abilities and attacks against champions and structures consume a charge, up to one per attack or cast. Consuming a charge grants 20. Receive diminishing gold from excessive minion kills.
Unique – Quest: Earn 500 using this item to upgrade to Frostfang, gaining the Warding active with 3 wards in stock.
passive.originText: UNIQUE – TRIBUTE: Grants a charge every 10 seconds, up to 3 charges. If an allied champion is nearby, damaging abilities and attacks against champions and structures consume a charge, up to one per attack or cast. Consuming a charge grants  20. Receive diminishing gold from excessive minion kills.

stats.originHTML:
Stats

+40 ability power
+20 ability haste
+200 health
+100% base mana regeneration

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Unique – Starlit Grace: When affecting champions with attacks or abilities in combat, heal the nearby allied champion (excluding yourself) with the most missing health for 70 (2 second cooldown).
Each second spent in combat with champions grants 7% heal and shield power, stacking up to 5 times for maximum of 35%.
Mythic Passive: Empowers each of your other Legendary items with 10 heal for this item's passive effect, Starlit Grace.
passive.originText:
UNIQUE – STARLIT GRACE: When affecting champions with attacks or abilities in combat,  heal the nearby allied champion (excluding yourself) with the most missing health for 70 (2 second cooldown).
Each second spent in combat with champions grants 7% heal and shield power, stacking up to 5 times for maximum of 35%.

stats.originHTML:
Stats

+60 ability power
+100% base mana regeneration
+10% heal and shield power

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Unique – Sanctify: Healing or shielding allied champions (excluding yourself) enhances you and them with 10% − 30% (based on target's level) bonus attack speed and 5 − 20 (based on target's level) bonus magic damage on-hit on basic attacks for 6 seconds.
passive.originText: UNIQUE – SANCTIFY:  Healing or  shielding allied champions (excluding yourself) enhances you and them with 10% − 30% (based on target's level) bonus attack speed and 5 − 20 (based on target's level) bonus magic damage on-hit on basic attacks for 6 seconds.

stats.originHTML:
Stats

+15 ability haste
+200 health
+100% base mana regeneration
+20% heal and shield power

active.originHTML:
Active

Unique – Intervention: You reveal the target area for 3 seconds. After a 2.5 second delay, a beam of light strikes the ground. Allies within the area are healed for 180 − 360 (based on target's level), while enemy champions take 10% of target's maximum health as true damage. Can be used while dead. (120 second cooldown; 5500 range).

(120 second cooldown; 5500 range).

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Unique: Grants Warmog's Heart if you have at least 1100 bonus health.
